scripts.loc: (node jsontools/toolloc.js && git -C .. add -f Jsons/language && git -C .. commit -m "update loc" && git -C .. push && echo "success") || echo "failure"
scripts.tv: (node jsontools/tooltv2.js && git -C .. add -f Jsons/tvConfig2.json && git -C .. commit -m "update tv" && git -C .. push && echo "success") || echo "failure"
scripts.dbtm: (node jsontools/tooldbtm.js && git -C .. add -f Jsons/dbtm.json && git -C .. commit -m "update dbtm" && git -C .. push && echo "success") || echo "failure"
scripts.cosmos: (node jsontools/toolcosmos.js && git -C .. add -f Jsons/cosmos.json && git -C .. commit -m "update cosmos" && git -C .. push && echo "success") || echo "failure"
scripts.sprite: (node "svg scripts/buildUiSprite.mjs" && git -C .. add -f Icons_UI/sprites-ui.svg && git -C .. commit -m "update sprite" && git -C .. push && echo "success") || echo "failure"
scripts.atlas: (node "Icons_TimeMarks scripts/buildIcons_TimeMarks.mjs" && git -C .. add -f Icons_TimeMarks/Atlas && git -C .. commit -m "update atlas" && git -C .. push && echo "success") || echo "failure"
